name: ThirtyThree - BasketBoy
description:
This game is

thirty-three The rules are: For each roll you get 3 points if you have < 30 points, if more then 1. After collecting 33 points, you win. In real life, 33 has the same rules but with the condition that they throw in turn and from where you caught the ball after the previous player, so the location of the ring changes to get closer to realism
